00032 enum LogLevel {error = 1, warning, info, verbose_info};

00035 
00036 class MSubject : public std::string
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     template<typename T> MSubject( const T &cont ) {
00040         std::ostringstream text;
00041         text << cont;
00042         assign( text.str() );
00043     }
00044 };
00045 
00047 namespace _internal

00050 const char *logLevelNames( LogLevel level );
00051 
00052 template<class MODULE> class Log;
00053 class Message;
00054 
00055 class MessageHandlerBase
00056 {
00057     static LogLevel m_stop_below;
00058 protected:
00059     MessageHandlerBase( LogLevel level ): m_level( level ) {}
00060     virtual ~MessageHandlerBase() {}
00061 public:
00062     LogLevel m_level;
00063     virtual void commit( const Message &msg ) = 0;
00064     static void stopBelow( LogLevel = error );
00065     bool requestStop( LogLevel _level );
00066 };
00067 
00068 class Message: public std::ostringstream
00069 {
00070     boost::weak_ptr<MessageHandlerBase> commitTo;
00071 public:
00072     std::string m_object, m_module;
00073     boost::filesystem::path m_file;
00074     std::list<std::string> m_subjects;
00075     boost::posix_time::ptime m_timeStamp;
00076     int m_line;
00077     LogLevel m_level;
00078     Message( std::string object, std::string module, std::string file, int line, LogLevel m_level, boost::weak_ptr<MessageHandlerBase> commitTo );
00079     Message( const Message &src );
00080     ~Message();
00081     std::string merge()const;
00082     std::string strTime()const;
00083     template<typename T> Message &operator << ( T val ) {
00084         *( ( std::ostringstream * )this ) << val;
00085         return *this;
00086     }
00087     Message &operator << ( const MSubject &subj ) {
00088         m_subjects.push_back( subj );
00089         *( ( std::ostringstream * )this ) << "{s}";
00090         return *this;
00091     }
00092     bool shouldCommit()const;
00093 };
00094 }
